description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+25 vs AC; 1d8+5 damage.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Lightning

Standard

Ranged 20

+28 vs Reflex; 4d6+12 lightning damage. Secondary Targets: Two creatures within 5 squares of the primary target; +28 vs. Reflex; 2d6+12 damage. Tertiary Targets: All other enemies within 20 squares of the caster; +28 vs. Reflex; 1d6+12 lightning damage.

Daily

Standard

Ranged 10

+28 vs Reflex; 5d10+12 damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends). Aftereffect: Ongoing 5 damage (save ends). Miss: 3d10+12 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Force

Standard

Ranged 20

Targets up to three creatures; +28 vs Reflex; (+4 power bonus to attack roll if targeting one creature)3d6+12 force damage, and the target is dazed until the end of the caster's next turn.

At-Will ✦ Thunder

Standard

Close blast 3

+25 vs Fortitude; 2d6+11 thunder damage, and the target is pushed 5 squares.

Encounter ✦ Illusion

Immediate Interrupt

Ranged 5

Trigger: When a ranged or a melee attack hits the caster or one of his allies in range, encounter

The attacker must reroll the attack roll.

Daily ✦ Illusion

Minor

Until the end of the encounter, Leglanth or Yargo gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses, and enemies more than 5 squares away from him cannot see him.

Encounter ✦ Teleportation

Move

Leglanth or Yargo teleports up to 5 squares.
